name: testtask1
description: 1. Install Nightwatchjs ( http://nightwatchjs.org/ ) 2. Using Nightwatch, write a script for automated test to:  a. Navigate to https://www.united.com  b. Fill the search criteria:  -- i. One-way flight  -- ii. From “New York JFK” to “Miami, FL, US (MIA - All Airports)”  --  iii. Depart date August 20th  --  iv. Economy class  c. Click Find flights  d. In the flight table:  -- i. Sort the flights by Economy (Most Restricted), lowest price first  -- ii. Collect Depart, Arrive, Stops, Duration, Price (Economy (Most Restricted) price only) data in a json object.  -- iii. If the flight is not available for Price criteria: (Economy (Most Restricted), filter the flight data out of the json object  -- iv. Print the final json object in the console.
author: Anna Kirsteina
